攔.definition: to block sb's path; to obstruct; to flag down (a taxi)

攔住.definition: to stop; to bar the way

攔劫.definition: to mug; to intercept and rob

攔檢.definition: (of police etc) to stop (sb) for inspection; to pull (sb) over

攔網.definition: to intercept at the net (volleyball, tennis etc); to block

攔腰.definition: (hitting) squarely in the middle; (slicing) across the middle; to hold by the waist

攔路.definition: to block sb's path; to waylay

攔車.definition: to thumb a lift; to hitchhike
